item.title: Apple Patents Next-Generation Taptic Engine
item.description: Apple has been granted a patent for a shock-resistant haptic engine design that aims to significantly improve the durability of future iPhones, Apple Watches, and other devices. The iPhone 14 Pro’s Ta
